question: Look for info in the documents and tell me how to get out of jail?
answer:
To get out of Jail in the context provided, you can use one of the following methods:  
1. **Throwing Doubles**: Roll the dice, and if you throw doubles on any of your next three turns, you may immediately move forward the number of spaces indicated by your throw. (Source: "/part-vol-3/weaver-core/particle_transformer_quant/Proj_Files/Agentic_AI-RAG/Upload_File/monopoly.pdf:4:0")  
2. **Get Out of Jail Free Card**: Use a "Get Out of Jail Free" card if you have it. If you draw this card but choose not to use it, it can be sold to another player. (Source: "/part-vol-3/weaver-core/particle_transformer_quant/Proj_Files/Agentic_AI-RAG/Upload_File/monopoly.pdf:2:2")  
3. **Purchase a Get Out of Jail Free Card**: Buy the card from another player and then play it to get out.  
4. **Paying a Fine**: Pay a fine of $50 before rolling the dice on either of your next two turns. If you do not throw doubles by your third turn, you will have to pay the $50 fine and can then move forward the number of spaces shown by your next throw. (Source: "/part-vol-3/weaver-core/particle_transformer_quant/Proj_Files/Agentic_AI-RAG/Upload_File/monopoly.pdf:4:2")  

Note: Even while in Jail, you can buy and sell properties, houses, and hotels, and collect rents. (Source: "/part-vol-3/weaver-core/particle_transformer_quant/Proj_Files/Agentic_AI-RAG/Upload_File/monopoly.pdf:4:1")
